tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE 5g_network_elements_configuration (
  element_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  element_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  parameter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  parameter_value TEXT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE configuration_settings (
    setting_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    element_id INT NOT NULL,
    setting_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    setting_value TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE parameter_values (
    param_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    element_id INT NOT NULL,
    param_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    param_value TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE parameter_values (
    parameter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    element_id UUID,
    parameter_name TEXT,
    parameter_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (element_id) REFERENCES network_elements(element_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ElementParameterValues (
    element_id INT,
    parameter_id INT,
    value VARCHAR(255),
    PRIMARY KEY (element_id, parameter_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (element_id) REFERENCES NetworkElementConfigurations(element_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (parameter_id) REFERENCES ElementParameters(parameter_id)
);
